response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to secure and improve the performance of event-driven systems built with FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Use FastAPI's built-in security features like OpenAPI security and Rate Limiting
Implement Input Validation to ensure data integrity
Leverage asynchronous functions for improved performance
Follow best practices for organizing your project structure
Utilize Dependency Injection for better code modularity
